item.title: [SNIM] Svarnim Trade Udyog Ltd Appoints Mr. Rahul Sharma as Company Secretary and Compliance Officer
item.description:
Svarnim Trade Udyog Ltd, a company based in Kolkata, has appointed Mr. Rahul Sharma as its Company Secretary and Compliance Officer. Mr. Sharma, with membership number A79711, is an Associate Company Secretary (ACS) and has completed 21 months of Management Training with a practicing firm. He has been recognized for his strong analytical skills and professional excellence. The appointment was approved in a Board of Directors meeting held on 2nd March, 2026.

item.title: [RRECL] RDB Real Estate Constructions Ltd: Independent Director Mr. Samprati Kamdar Resigns Due to Pre-Occupation
item.description:
RDB Real Estate Constructions Ltd announced the resignation of its Independent Director, Mr. Samprati Kamdar, due to his pre-occupation and other personal commitments. The resignation is effective from the close of business hours on 027 March, 2026. Mr. Kamdar will also cease to be a member of the Audit Committee and Committee of Directors of the Board. The Board has reconstituted these Committees in accordance with applicable regulatory requirements. Mr. Kamdar confirmed that there are no other material reasons for his resignation other than those mentioned in his resignation letter. Mr. Kamdar served as the Chairman of the Audit, Nomination & Remuneration Committee and Stakeholders Relationship Committee at BFM Industries Limited and as an Independent Director at NTC Industries Limited.

  • Independent Director Mr. Samprati Kamdar resigns from RDB Real Estate Constructions Ltd.
  • Resignation effective from the close of business hours on 027 March, 2026.
  • Mr. Kamdar to cease membership in Audit Committee and Committee of Directors.
  • Board reconstitutes Committees in accordance with regulatory requirements.
  • Mr. Kamdar confirms no other material reasons for resignation.

item.title: [ACSTECH] ACS Technologies Ltd Revises Corporate Guarantee for Subsidiary Iotiq Innovations Private Limited
item.description:
ACS Technologies Ltd, formerly known as LN Industries India Limited, has revised its corporate guarantee for its subsidiary, Iotiq Innovations Private Limited. The Board of Directors approved an enhancement of the existing corporate guarantee from Rs. 2,50,00,000 to Rs. 4,50,00,000 in favor of State Bank of India. This enhancement is in compliance with the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015. The revised guarantee is provided on an arm's length basis and there is no impact on the Company other than disclosure in the Financial Statements.

  • ACS Technologies Ltd enhances corporate guarantee for subsidiary
  • Guarantee increased from Rs. 2,50,00,000 to Rs. 4,50,00,000
  • Guarantee given in favor of State Bank of India
  • Transaction done on an arm's length basis
  • No impact on the Company other than disclosure in Financial Statements

item.title: [DSFCL] DCM Shriram Fine Chemicals Appoints Alok Bansidhar Shriram and Sunil Behari Mathur as Additional Directors
item.description:
DCM Shriram Fine Chemicals Limited has appointed Mr. Alok Bansidhar Shriram and Mr. Sunil Behari Mathur as Additional Directors (Non Executive, Non Independent). The appointments are subject to approval of Shareholders. Both directors have confirmed that they are not debarred under the Companies Act, 2013 and SEBI LODR Regulations to hold an office of director. The composition of the Board of Directors of the Company will continue to be in compliance with the requirements prescribed under the Companies Act, 2013 and SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015.

item.title: [BHARATCOAL] Bharat Coking Coal Ltd Announces Changes in Key Managerial Personnel
item.description:
Bharat Coking Coal Ltd (BCCL) has announced changes in its key managerial personnel. The Board of Directors, in a meeting held on 28 February 2026, approved the appointment of Shri Rajesh Kumar as the Chief Financial Officer (CFO) with immediate effect. He replaces Shri M.S. Raju, who was earlier designated as CFO. The Board also approved the appointment of Shri Debanuj Debnath as the Company Secretary and Compliance Officer, effective 1 March 2026, following the superannuation of Shri Bani Kumar Parui on 28 February 2026. The changes were made to ensure continuity and efficiency in the company's financial and compliance operations.

  • Shri Rajesh Kumar appointed as CFO of BCCL
  • Shri M.S. Raju ceases to be CFO of BCCL
  • Shri Debanuj Debnath appointed as Company Secretary and Compliance Officer of BCCL
  • Shri Bani Kumar Parui superannuates from BCCL on 28 February 2026
  • Changes made to ensure continuity and efficiency in BCCL's financial and compliance operations

item.title: [RGF] RGF Capital Markets Ltd Closes Trading Window for Fund Raising Determination
item.description:
RGF Capital Markets Ltd has announced the closure of its trading window for all designated persons from March 01, 2026. This closure is in connection with the Board Meeting scheduled on March 06, 2026, which will determine the proposal for fund raising through rights issue, preferential issue, or any other permissible mode. The trading window will reopen 48 hours after the conclusion of the meeting.

  • RGF Capital Markets Ltd closes trading window for all designated persons from March 01, 2026.
  • The closure is in connection with the Board Meeting on March 06, 2026, for fund raising determination.
  • The trading window will reopen 48 hours after the Board Meeting.
  • Designated persons are advised not to buy, sell, pledge, or deal in the securities of the Company during this period.

item.title: [GSBFIN] GSB Finance Ltd Amends 'Code of Fair Disclosure' to Enhance Transparency
item.description:
GSB Finance Ltd has amended its 'Code of practices and procedures for fair disclosure of UPSI' to strengthen its framework and policy for fair disclosure of events and occurrences that could impact price discovery in the market for the securities of the Company. The amended Code intends to promote transparency amongst the investors and formulate a framework for fair disclosure of Unpublished Price Sensitive Information (UPSI). The amended Code is applicable to all the persons of the Company who could possess UPSI relating to the Company.

  • GSB Finance Ltd amends its 'Code of practices and procedures for fair disclosure of UPSI'
  • Strengthens framework and policy for fair disclosure of events and occurrences that could impact price discovery
  • Promotes transparency amongst the investors
  • Formulates a framework for fair disclosure of Unpublished Price Sensitive Information (UPSI)
  • Applicable to all the persons of the Company who could possess UPSI relating to the Company
